physical_appearance:The image depicts a print that is encased within a frame. There is a white boundary surrounding the print. A picture of a body of water and landforms is depicted. There are some trees and shrubs atop these landforms. The landforms are not uniform and protrude outwards and inwards
 In the distance at the horizon
 the outlines of more land masses can be discerned.

sgcool_label_text:This lithographic print was reproduced in John Cameron’s Our Tropical Possessions in Malayan India (Smith
 Elder \u0026 Co
 London
 1865). It was based on a photograph taken c.1860
 and engraved by Vincent Brooks.The print presents a view of New Harbour before it was developed into Keppel Harbour.

metadata.title_text: View of the Entrance to New Harbour - Singapore
metadata.physical_appearance: The image depicts a print that is encased within a frame. There is a white boundary surrounding the print. A picture of a body of water and landforms is depicted. There are some trees and shrubs atop these landforms. The landforms are not uniform and protrude outwards and inwards, In the distance at the horizon, the outlines of more land masses can be discerned.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This lithographic print was reproduced in John Cameron’s Our Tropical Possessions in Malayan India (Smith, Elder & Co, London, 1865). It was based on a photograph taken c.1860, and engraved by Vincent Brooks.The print presents a view of New Harbour before it was developed into Keppel Harbour.
